list_page_teaser: These politicians have written books that I have read and used to create images of their personalities.  Click to learn more!
description_html:
This gallery contains images of the personalities of established and up-and-coming politicians who have written at least one book.

The books are autobiographical in nature, and many of them are memoirs. All of them are personal accounts that give the reader a good sense of who the author is.

To see how each of these people might score on a Big Five OCEAN questionnaire, click on the SEE THE STORY button.
story_html:
Big Five OCEAN Results

Following are how — based on my informed opinion — these authors would score on Lewis Goldberg's 300-item open source questionnaire. These items can be found at the International Personality Item Pool.

Donald Trump Jr.
FactorPercentageInterpretation
Openness35%Low
Conscientiousness71%High
Extraversion75%High
Agreeableness23%Low
Neuroticism28%Low
Michael Bloomberg
FactorPercentageInterpretation
Openness63%A Little High
Conscientiousness76%High
Extraversion65%High
Agreeableness62%A Little High
Neuroticism27%Low
Nikki Haley
FactorPercentageInterpretation
Openness56%A Little High
Conscientiousness75%High
Extraversion61%A Little High
Agreeableness66%High
Neuroticism28%Low
Stacey Abrams
FactorPercentageInterpretation
Openness66%High
Conscientiousness75%High
Extraversion52%Average
Agreeableness69%High
Neuroticism35%Low
Ted Cruz
FactorPercentageInterpretation
Openness41%A Little Low
Conscientiousness68%High
Extraversion62%A Little High
Agreeableness25%Low
Neuroticism33%Low

Because I am still learning about this Five Factor Model of personality, I am unable to offer much more in the way of interpretation of these results at this time.
affiliate_ad_html:

The new ebook Visualizing Politicians' Personalities, 2019 Incumbents and Candidates contains images of the personalities of over a dozen contemporary politicians, along with insights impossible to share on this site!

Get your copy today!

image_list.title: Donald Trump Jr.
image_list.subtitle_html: Eldest Son of Donald Trump
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Donald Trump Jr.'s spiritual portrait shows he is extremely decisive, cold, and pragmatic.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Don Jr.'s dominant personality trait, his very strong tendency to be logical and impersonal rather than emotional and irrational.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  He demonstrates this trait in the way he coldly and instantly divides people into conservative and liberal based solely on their political leanings, forgoing any attempt to acknowledge nuance or bipartisanship.
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents Don Jr.'s auxiliary personality trait, his strong tendency to be practial and pragmatic rather than idealistic and principled.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  He demonstrates this trait in the way he cannot see how it is inconsistent to complain in Chapter 8 about how social networks like twitter have spoiled children, giving them "the kind of power you shouldn't have at any age" [p. 133], then later claim in Chapter 13 that without those same social networks "we might very well have ended up with Hillary Clinton as president" [p.213].
image_list.story_intro_html: This image of Donald Trump Jr.'s personality shows he is extremely log....
image_list.story_html:
This image of Donald Trump Jr.'s personality shows he is extremely logical and pragmatic.

This spiritual portrait is based on his book Triggered: How the Left Thrives on Hate and Wants to Silence Us, published in 2020. For more abut Don Jr., see my review of it on goodreads.com!

image_list.title: Michael Bloomberg
image_list.subtitle_html: Co-founder of Bloomberg L.P.
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Michael Bloomberg's spiritual portrait shows he is outgoing, prefers to be rational and decisive, and has a slight tendency to be idealistic yet remains very well-grounded.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Michael's dominant personality trait, his objectivity and tendency to be logical rather than irrational.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  He demonstrates this trait in the way he treats his company's employees objectively, disdaining perks for senior managers such as reserved parking spaces and executive dining rooms.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents Michael's auxiliary personality trait, his very slight preference for and openness to ideas.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  It's important to note this preference is very slight, and Michael can be quite pragmatic when the situation calls for it.
image_list.story_intro_html: This image of Michael Bloomberg's personality shows he is logical and has a slight....
image_list.story_html:
This image of Michael Bloomberg's personality shows he is logical and has a slight tendency to be more idealistic than pragmatic.

This spiritual portrait is based on his book Bloomberg by Bloomberg, published in 2019. For more abut Michael, see my review of it on goodreads.com!

image_list.title: Nikki Haley
image_list.subtitle_html: 29th Ambassador to the UN, From Jan. 25, 2017 to Dec. 31, 2018
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Nikki Haley's spiritual portrait shows she is outgoing, rational, and realistic - but not overly so.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Nikki's dominant personality trait, her fairly strong tendency to be rational, objective, and cool-headed.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  She demonstrates this trait by waiting twenty-four hours before before returning fire after being criticized for a decision, rather than responding in the heat of the moment.
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents Nikki's auxiliary personality trait, her pragmatic and realistic outlook.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  She demonstrates this trait by working hard and focusing on what is in front of her, even though this can be extremely difficult after a tragic event such as the Mother Emanuel shootings.
image_list.story_intro_html: This image of Nikki Haley's personality shows she is logical, pragmatic, and ....
image_list.story_html:
This image of Nikki Haley's personality shows she is logical, pragmatic, and down-to-earth.

This spiritual portrait is based on her book With All Due Respect: Defending America With Grit and Grace, published in 2019. For more abut Nikki, see my review of it on goodreads.com!

image_list.title: Stacey Abrams
image_list.subtitle_html: Minority Leader in Georgia's House of Representatives, From January 10, 2011 to July 1, 2017
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Stacey Abrams' spiritual portrait shows she is decisive, tends to be withdrawn, and has fairly mild tendencies to be logical and idealistic.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents Stacey's dominant personality trait, her idealism and hope for the future.  In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.  She demonstrates this trait repeatedly in her book, which seeks to help people identify what they want and learn how to live the life they dream of living.
image_list.explain_aux: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Stacey's auxiliary personality trait, her objectivity and ability to create logical step-by-step processes.  In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.  She exhibits this trait repeatedly in the advice she offers in her book, which, for example, suggests specific steps for getting what you want and tried-and-true methods for prioritizing tasks.
image_list.story_intro_html: This image of Stacey Abrams' personality shows she is fairly logical and has a tend....
image_list.story_html:
This image of Stacey Abrams' personality shows she is fairly logical and has a tendency to be more idealistic than pragmatic.

This spiritual portrait is based on her book Minority Leader: How to Lead From the Outisde and Make Real Change, published in 2018. For more abut Stacey, see my review of it on goodreads.com!

image_list.title: Ted Cruz
image_list.subtitle_html: US Senator From Texas, Jan. 3, 2013 to Present
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Ted Cruz's spiritual portrait shows he is outgoing, very decisive and logical, and tends to be motivated by his ideals.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Ted's dominant personality trait, his fairly strong tendency to be rational, impersonal, and objective.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  He demonstrates this trait in his decision to study law, because a career in the legal profession demands the willingness and ability to be very logical.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents Ted's auxiliary personality trait, his tendency to see the world through an idealistic lens.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  He demonstrates this trait in his decision to name his book, "A Time for Truth," because the idea of telling the truth is all too frequently a foreign notion for many politicians.
image_list.story_intro_html: This image of Ted Cruz's personality shows he is very logical and has a tenden....>
image_list.story_html:
This image of Ted Cruz's personality shows he is very logical and has a tendency to be more idealistic than pragmatic.

This spiritual portrait is based on his book A Time for Truth, Reigniting the Promise of America, published in 2015. For more abut Ted, see my review of it on goodreads.com!
